title: Large Deposit Documentation Required
description: Bank statement shows mobile check deposit of $12,000 on 09/12/2024 that requires sourcing documentation
detailedDescription: The September 2024 Chase checking statement shows a large mobile check deposit of $12,000 which exceeds the threshold requiring documentation. Per underwriting guidelines, any deposit over $1,000 that is not a payroll direct deposit must be documented with source verification.
requiredAction: Provide copy of deposited check (front and back) showing payor and memo, OR provide letter from payor explaining purpose of funds

title: Bonus Income Documentation
description: Verify $29,500 bonus deposit with employer letter or pay stub showing bonus payment
detailedDescription: Bank statement shows direct deposit labeled 'TECH SOLUTIONS INC (Bonus)' for $29,500 on 09/30/2024. This represents a significant portion of the borrower's qualifying income and requires employer verification.
requiredAction: Obtain letter from Tech Solutions Inc on company letterhead confirming bonus amount, payment date, and indicating whether bonuses are recurring/expected in future years

title: Letter of Explanation - Overdraft Fee
description: Provide explanation for overdraft fee on 09/22/2024
detailedDescription: Checking account shows overdraft fee of $35.00 on 09/22/2024 with account going negative to -$160.00. While this was quickly resolved, underwriting requires written explanation for any NSF/overdraft activity.
requiredAction: Write letter explaining circumstances that led to overdraft (large credit card payment timing issue) and steps taken to prevent recurrence

title: Additional Asset Documentation for Cash to Close
description: Current verified liquid assets insufficient to cover cash to close plus reserves
detailedDescription: Verified checking account balance ($31,285.50) is insufficient for cash to close ($115,000) plus 2 months reserves ($5,917.74). Total required: $120,917.74. Shortfall: $89,632.24. Need to verify additional asset accounts.
requiredAction: Provide 2 most recent statements for: Wells Fargo Savings ($85,000) and Fidelity 401k ($275,000). Note: If using retirement funds, may be subject to 30% liquidity reduction.

title: CPA Letter - Self-Employed Income Verification
description: Obtain CPA letter explaining 9.4% income decline from 2023 to 2024 YTD
detailedDescription: 2023 tax return shows Schedule C net profit of $215,480, but 2024 YTD P&L (9 months) shows $146,410, projecting to ~$195,213 annually (9.4% decline). Self-employed borrowers with declining income require CPA verification and explanation.
requiredAction: Obtain letter from CPA on professional letterhead explaining: (1) reason for income decline, (2) whether decline is temporary or permanent, (3) projected Q4 2024 income, (4) verification that P&L is accurate and prepared in accordance with GAAP

title: Business Revenue Documentation
description: Provide contracts or invoices showing Q4 2024 expected revenue to support income stability
detailedDescription: To demonstrate that Q4 2024 will bring income back in line with 2023 levels, need to show active business pipeline and committed projects.
requiredAction: Provide: (1) Active client contracts showing work commitments through end of 2024, OR (2) Invoices from Sept/Oct 2024 showing business activity level, OR (3) Client list with project status report

title: Update Loan Application - Child Support Obligation
description: Divorce decree shows $1,200/month child support not listed in application liabilities
detailedDescription: Divorce decree from 03/15/2022 specifies monthly child support obligation of $1,200 until child reaches age 18. This liability is not reflected in the loan application, which would materially affect DTI calculation.
requiredAction: Submit revised loan application including child support payment of $1,200/month in monthly debt obligations. Processor will recalculate DTI (currently 23.80%, will increase to approximately 30.67% with child support added).

notes.author: Underwriter James Park
notes.note: Even with updated DTI of ~30.67%, loan still meets conventional guidelines (max 45%). However, must be corrected before final approval.

title: 2022 Tax Return Required
description: Self-employed borrowers require 2 years tax returns - only 2023 provided
detailedDescription: Self-employment income verification requires 2 years of personal and business tax returns to establish income trend and stability. Only 2023 return has been provided.
requiredAction: Provide complete 2022 Form 1040 with all schedules (especially Schedule C showing Martinez Design Studio business income)

title: Gift Letter and Gift Funds Documentation
description: Gift letter required for $10,000 gift from parents for down payment
detailedDescription: Purchase agreement and asset review indicate borrowers will receive $10,000 gift from parents to help with down payment. FHA requires specific gift documentation.
requiredAction: Provide: (1) Gift letter on FHA-approved format signed by donors stating gift amount, relationship, no repayment expected, and property address. (2) Donor bank statement showing withdrawal of $10,000. (3) Borrower bank statement showing deposit of $10,000.

title: Additional Bank Statements - Ally Bank Savings
description: Provide 2 most recent statements for Ally Bank savings account ($14,500)
detailedDescription: Loan application lists Ally Bank online savings with $14,500 balance. Need to verify this account with 2 consecutive monthly statements to confirm funds for closing.
requiredAction: Provide 2 most recent monthly statements from Ally Bank (account ****9012) showing current balance of approximately $14,500

title: Retirement Account Statements
description: Provide statements for Fidelity 401k ($18,500) and CalSTRS Pension ($12,400)
detailedDescription: To verify total assets meet cash to close requirements, need to document retirement accounts. Note: FHA allows 60% of vested retirement balance (401k) and 60% of vested pension for reserves calculation.
requiredAction: Provide most recent quarterly statements for: (1) Borrower Fidelity 401k showing ~$18,500 balance, (2) Co-borrower CalSTRS pension showing ~$12,400 vested balance

title: Letter of Explanation - 30-Day Late Payment
description: Explain 30-day late payment on Capital One credit card from November 2023
detailedDescription: Credit report shows 30-day delinquency on Capital One account in November 2023 (11 months ago). While isolated late payment over 12 months old is generally acceptable, FHA requires written explanation for any derogatory credit.
requiredAction: Provide detailed letter explaining: (1) what caused the late payment in Nov 2023, (2) how it was resolved, (3) what steps have been taken to prevent future late payments (payment reminders, auto-pay, etc.), (4) why credit should be considered acceptable despite this incident

title: Letter of Explanation - Recent Credit Inquiries
description: Explain 3 credit inquiries in last 6 months
detailedDescription: Credit report shows 3 credit inquiries in the past 6 months. While not excessive, underwriting wants to ensure these don't represent undisclosed new debt obligations.
requiredAction: Provide letter listing each of the 3 credit inquiries, explaining purpose (e.g., rate shopping for mortgage, declined credit card application, auto loan inquiry, etc.) and confirming no new accounts were opened

title: Student Loan Payment Verification
description: Verify actual student loan payment amounts for both borrowers
detailedDescription: Credit report and loan application show student loans for both borrowers. FHA requires verification of actual monthly payment, not just 0.5% of balance.
requiredAction: Provide current student loan statements showing: (1) Borrower Nelnet loan - actual monthly payment amount, (2) Co-borrower Great Lakes loan - actual monthly payment amount. Statements should be dated within 90 days.

title: Current Lease Agreement for Rental Property
description: Lease agreement for Tustin rental property expired June 30, 2024 - need current lease
detailedDescription: Submitted lease agreement for 1245 Prospect Avenue, Tustin shows lease term from 07/01/2023 to 06/30/2024 (expired). Cannot count rental income toward qualifying without proof of current lease or month-to-month continuation.
requiredAction: Provide ONE of the following: (1) New/renewed lease agreement with current tenants OR new tenants showing lease term, OR (2) Letter from tenants confirming month-to-month continuation at $3,000/month with landlord permission, OR (3) Property management company letter confirming ongoing tenancy and rent amount

notes.author: Underwriter David Kim
notes.note: Borrower indicated tenants are continuing on month-to-month basis. Need written documentation to verify ongoing rental income of $36,000 annually.

title: Proof of Recent Rent Payment
description: Verify current rent is being received from Tustin rental property tenants
detailedDescription: To confirm rental income is current and ongoing, need to see proof of recent rent collection (within last 60 days).
requiredAction: Provide proof of most recent rent payment: (1) Bank statement showing deposit of $3,000 from tenant, OR (2) Canceled rent check (front and back), OR (3) Property management statement showing rent collected and remitted

title: Corrected Insurance Quote - Wrong Property Type
description: Insurance shows HO-6 (condo) but property is Single Family - need HO-3 or DP-3 policy
detailedDescription: Submitted insurance quote shows HO-6 policy type, which is for condominiums. Subject property at 1824 Bayside Drive is a Single Family Residence used as investment property, requiring HO-3 (homeowners) or DP-3 (dwelling fire/landlord) policy.
requiredAction: Obtain corrected insurance quote with: (1) HO-3 or DP-3 policy type appropriate for Single Family investment property, (2) Coverage amount at least $560,000 (loan amount), (3) Landlord/investment property endorsements, (4) Loss of rents coverage recommended

notes.author: Processor Rachel Green
notes.note: Contacted borrower's insurance agent (State Farm). Agent acknowledged error and will provide corrected DP-3 landlord policy quote by 10/25.

title: Investment Account Statement
description: Provide most recent statement for Morgan Stanley Brokerage account ($780,000)
detailedDescription: Loan application shows significant investment assets in Morgan Stanley brokerage account. While not needed for cash to close (liquid assets are sufficient), underwriting wants to verify total net worth for file completeness.
requiredAction: Provide most recent monthly or quarterly statement for Morgan Stanley Individual Brokerage account (****8901) showing balance of approximately $780,000
